CreateCampaign.name: CreateCampaign
CreateCampaign.description: Grants permission to create a campaign

DeleteCampaign.name: DeleteCampaign
DeleteCampaign.description: Grants permission to delete a campaign

DeleteConnectInstanceConfig.name: DeleteConnectInstanceConfig
DeleteConnectInstanceConfig.description: Grants permission to remove configuration information for an Amazon Connect instance

DeleteInstanceOnboardingJob.name: DeleteInstanceOnboardingJob
DeleteInstanceOnboardingJob.description: Grants permission to remove onboarding job for an Amazon Connect instance

DescribeCampaign.name: DescribeCampaign
DescribeCampaign.description: Grants permission to describe a specific campaign

GetCampaignState.name: GetCampaignState
GetCampaignState.description: Grants permission to get state of a campaign

GetCampaignStateBatch.name: GetCampaignStateBatch
GetCampaignStateBatch.description: Grants permission to get state of campaigns

GetConnectInstanceConfig.name: GetConnectInstanceConfig
GetConnectInstanceConfig.description: Grants permission to get configuration information for an Amazon Connect instance

GetInstanceOnboardingJobStatus.name: GetInstanceOnboardingJobStatus
GetInstanceOnboardingJobStatus.description: Grants permission to get onboarding job status for an Amazon Connect instance

ListCampaigns.name: ListCampaigns
ListCampaigns.description: Grants permission to provide summary of all campaigns

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a resource

PauseCampaign.name: PauseCampaign
PauseCampaign.description: Grants permission to pause a campaign

PutDialRequestBatch.name: PutDialRequestBatch
PutDialRequestBatch.description: Grants permission to create dial requests for the specified campaign

ResumeCampaign.name: ResumeCampaign
ResumeCampaign.description: Grants permission to resume a campaign

StartCampaign.name: StartCampaign
StartCampaign.description: Grants permission to start a campaign

StartInstanceOnboardingJob.name: StartInstanceOnboardingJob
StartInstanceOnboardingJob.description: Grants permission to start onboarding job for an Amazon Connect instance

StopCampaign.name: StopCampaign
StopCampaign.description: Grants permission to stop a campaign

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag a resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag a resource

UpdateCampaignDialerConfig.name: UpdateCampaignDialerConfig
UpdateCampaignDialerConfig.description: Grants permission to update the dialer configuration of a campaign

UpdateCampaignName.name: UpdateCampaignName
UpdateCampaignName.description: Grants permission to update the name of a campaign

UpdateCampaignOutboundCallConfig.name: UpdateCampaignOutboundCallConfig
UpdateCampaignOutboundCallConfig.description: Grants permission to update the outbound call configuration of a campaign
